body_html:
I don't think there is a way to configure this; 9fe7c29 changed the chunk splitting policy to be less wasteful though.

If you're running a release before this commit, you might want to try updating. If you're already past this change, I don't know if there is a knob to select here.
body_text:
I don't think there is a way to configure this; 9fe7c29 changed the chunk splitting policy to be less wasteful though.
If you're running a release before this commit, you might want to try updating.  If you're already past this change, I don't know if there is a knob to select here.
body:
I don't think there is a way to configure this; https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/9fe7c29605a5ee1519cceba8e67a6d8413444fac changed the chunk splitting policy to be less wasteful though.

If you're running a release before this commit, you might want to try updating.  If you're already past this change, I don't know if there is a knob to select here.
